product_name: Aqua Sphere Moby Kids Clear Lens Swim Goggles - Boys'
long_description: The Aqua Sphere Moby Kids Clear Lens Swim Goggles fit small faces via an easy-adjust buckle, and provide great visibility in the indoor or in low light outdoors. Strap easily adjusts to create a personalized fit. Comfortable eye cups resist leaks. Durable Plexisol(R) flat lenses feature scratch-resistant and fog-resistant coatings. Lenses offer 100% UVA and UVB protection.
short_description: The Aqua Sphere Moby Kids Clear Lens Swim Goggles fit small faces via an easy-adjust buckle, and provide great visibility in the indoor or in low light outdoors.
